HOW WE VET
EVERY OPPORTUNITY

We know your time is valuable. That's why we review over 200+ opportunities every single week, so you only see the cream of the crop.

Our 12-Point Checklist

Source Authenticity

We only source from official organization websites, government portals, and verified partners. No third-party hearsay.

Benefit Validation

We verify the exact prize pool, scholarship amount, or certificate value to ensure it's worth your time.

Deadline Accuracy

Dates are cross-checked across multiple sources to ensure you never miss a real window or chase a fake one.

Eligibility Scan

We verify grades, age brackets, and regional restrictions so you don't apply to something you can't win.

Host Credibility

Is the organizer legitimate? We check for office addresses, registration details, and track records.

Data Safe Zone

We only link to secure platforms (HTTPS). Your personal data should never be on a sketchy form.

Hidden Fee Audit

We hunt for 'pay-to-win' traps. If it's free, it must stay free. No hidden processing costs allowed.

Legalese Cleanup

Our team skims the fine print for predatory terms where they might 'own' your IP or content forever.

Contact Check

Every opportunity must have a reachable support team. No ghosts allowed in the Myark discovery engine.

Prestige Score

Is this a high-aura W for your CV? We prioritize opportunities from world-class institutes and brands.

Winner History

Has the host actually awarded prizes in the past? We look for evidence of successful previous editions.

Mobile Ready

We test the application flow on mobile to ensure you can apply while on the bus or between classes.

THE VERIFICATION FLOW

From initial discovery to your dashboard, here's the journey.

01

Discovery & Sourcing

Our crawlers and community scouts identify ~200+ opportunities weekly across the global web.

02

The Vetting Gauntlet

Our curation team applies a 12-point checklist to filter out scams, expired links, and low-value contests.

03

Gamification Mapping

We assign XP values and relevant tags based on the difficulty and prestige of the opportunity.

04

Verification Pulse

Even after posting, we monitor links daily to ensure they remain active until the deadline.

Quality Over Quantity

"Our mission isn't to have the most opportunities, but to have the right ones. We reject 82% of what we find so you can focus on winning."

No Scams
No Expired Links
